title: An Act to mandate domestic violence and sexual assault awareness education

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Barber of Somerville and Donato of Medford, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 323) of Christine P. Barber for legislation to mandate domestic violence and sexual assault awareness education for certain licensed professionals.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-11:30 AM in A-2                                                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
